document.full_text: employees at nissan motor co  are working hard to restore quake-hit production at japan's no.2 automaker to full levels before its october target, although such an early recovery may be hard to achieve, chief executive carlos ghosn said on tuesday.
document.title: nissan working to restore full production before oct: ceo
lines_and_colors: employees at nissan motor co  are working hard to restore quake-hit production at japan's no.2 automaker to full levels before its october target, although such an early recovery may be hard to achieve, chief executive carlos ghosn said on tuesday.
